
                                            DELETE from moviemeasure.eu_movies_shows 
                                            where 
                                             date_sh>=curdate()-1
                                            and mm_id in ("640bcab9a2c8a43d18eba272","6422342c4893a4f9829c1ea2","642234314893a4f9829c1f8e","642234314893a4f9829c1fae","642234334893a4f9829c2027","642234394893a4f9829c2175","6422343a4893a4f9829c21ad","6422343b4893a4f9829c21d0","642234484893a4f9829c2461","6422344e4893a4f9829c2614","642234504893a4f9829c2660","642234514893a4f9829c26b1","642234544893a4f9829c277a","642234584893a4f9829c2867","642234594893a4f9829c28c7","642234594893a4f9829c28dc","6422345c4893a4f9829c2979","642234614893a4f9829c2a7e","642234614893a4f9829c2a87","642234614893a4f9829c2a8f","64238393a2c3a2aea7d1265d","642384c1a2c3a2aea7d13151","642385d0a2c3a2aea7d13745","6424d6453c44b3f499f4637b","6424d6503c44b3f499f46399","6424d7393c44b3f499f464b5","64277935dbdc3b8f9ce16560","642b6df49b31f458fc79c779")
